description: This metadata file acts as the list of record for the Spase Naming Authorities.

ASWS.title: Australian Space Weather Services
ASWS.description: Assigns resource IDs for data registered in the Australian Space Weather Services (ASWS).

CCMC.title: Community Coordinated Modeling Center
CCMC.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the Community Coordinated Modeling Center (CCMC).

CNES.title: Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales
CNES.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales (CNES).

CFA.title: The Center for Astrophysics of Harvard & Smithsonian
CFA.description: Assigns resource IDs for data registered in the The Center for Astrophysics of Harvard & Smithsonian (CFA).

CSA.title: Canadian Space Agency
CSA.description: Assigns resource IDs for data registered in the Canadian Space Agency (CSA).

CSSDP.title: Canadian Space Science Data Portal
CSSDP.description: Assigns resource IDs for data registered in the Canadian Space Science Data Portal (CSSDP).

DLR.title: Deutsches Zentrum für Luft- und Raumfahrt
DLR.description: Assigns resource IDs for data registered in the Deutsches Zentrum für Luft- und Raumfahrt (DLR).

DOD.title: Department of Defense
DOD.description: Assigns resource IDs for data registered in the Department of Defense (DOD).

ESA.title: European Space Agency
ESA.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the European Space Agency (ESA).

ESA-NASA.title: ESA and NASA missions
ESA-NASA.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from ESA-NASA shared missions.

FMI.title: Finnish Meteorlogical Institute
FMI.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the Finnish Meteorlogical Institute (FMI) Space and Earth Observation Centre.

GMU.title: George Mason University
GMU.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from George Mason University.

GONG.title: Global Oscillation Network Group
GONG.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the Global Oscillation Network Group (GONG).

HamSCI.title: Ham Radio Science Citizen Investigation
HamSCI.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the Ham Radio Science Citizen Investigation (HamSCI).

INAF.title: Istituto Nazionale Di Astrofisica
INAF.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the Istituto Nazionale Di Astrofisica (INAF).

INSU.title: Institut national des sciences de l'Univers
INSU.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the Institut national des sciences de l'Univers (INSU).

IRF.title: Swedish institute for space physics
IRF.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from Swedish institute for space physics(IRF).

ISWI.title: International Space Weather Initiative
ISWI.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the International Space Weather Initiative (ISWI).

IUGONET.title: Inter-university Upper atmosphere Global Observation NETwork
IUGONET.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the Inter-university Upper atmosphere Global Observation NETwork (IUGONET).

KASI.title: Korean Astronomy and Space Science Institute
KASI.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the Korean Astronomy and Space Science Institute (KASI).

KSB-ROB.title: Royal Observatory of Belgium
KSB-ROB.description: SPASE resource descriptions with Royal Observatory of Belgium naming authority.

GBO.title: Ground Based Observatories
GBO.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the ground based observatories (GBO).

JAXA.title: Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency
JAXA.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA).

NagoyaU.title: Nagoya University
NagoyaU.description: Nagoya University is a Japanese national university located in Nagoya, Aichi prefecture, Japan.

NASA.title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration
NASA.description: Assigns resource IDs for data generated through the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA).

NOAA.title: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration
NOAA.description: Assigns resource IDs for data registered in National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) data systems.

NSF.title: National Science Foundation
NSF.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the National Science Foundation (NSF).

SMWG.title: SPASE Metadata Working Group
SMWG.description: The community location for entities such as persons, observatories, instruments, repositories, registries and services.

UOULU.title: University of Oulu
UOULU.description: Assigns resource IDs for data available from the University of Oulu (UOULU).

Community.title: Community
Community.description: The community location for groups of individuals or affinity associations.
